data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Nong Bua Lam Phu, Thailand by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nong Bua Lam Phu, Thailand
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Nong Bua Lam Phu, Thailand that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Nong Bua Lam Phu.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 482,200 people living in Nong Bua Lam Phu through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Thai, Tak Bai people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Nong Bua Lam Phu, Thailand.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Nong Bua Lam Phu access to a Bible in their own language.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Nong Bua Lam Phu to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
